item.title: How do i code please? click ere for an answer
item.dc:creator: @Sp3ke Sp3ke
item.description:
@Sp3ke wrote:

To make NPC’s talk go to npchandler.java and either edit an already existing NPC or make a new one using the following code, but be aware that making NPC’s talk causes lag, especially once you get alot of players :

		if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCIDHERE && misc.random2(20) == 1) {
							npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdate = "TEXTHERE";
						}

TEXTHERE = YOUR TEXT
NPCID = ID OF THE NPC

Read full topic

item.title: How do i code please? click ere for an answer
item.dc:creator: @xxnawafxx xxnawafxx
item.description:
@xxnawafxx wrote:

[quote=“Crackbone, post:2, topic:304235”]Uh…As walls you mean objects?

What source are you using by the way?

You need to find the file where server keeps objects…Then find coordination for the new object you want to put,and find the ID for the object.[/quote] thanks dude u rock

@Crackbone wrote:

Uh…As walls you mean objects?

What source are you using by the way?

You need to find the file where server keeps objects…Then find coordination for the new object you want to put,and find the ID for the object.
